content: the brecken basket is a midsized basket with 2 side handles that can be used to hold so many things use it to store yarn or even as a pant pot cover this is a beginner friendly pattern that uses basic crochet stitches the instructions show you how to use 3 colors to create a striped design but feel free to use as many or few colors as you d like this basket uses 2 strands of bulky weight yarn held together to make a sturdy basket that won t flop over if you are unable to find a bulky weight yarn you can substitute for 1 strand of super bulky 6 weight yarn note that the size and sturdiness may differ if a different yarn is used difficulty easy standard us crochet terms finished size approx 10 x 10 supplies 2 strands of bulky 5 weight yarn held together 8 00mm l hook yarn needle & scissors for yarn i used lion brand yarn hue + me 196 yards of white 78 yards black 116 yards orange patten also includes -gauge pattern -link to free video tutorial -special stitches instructions & photos -detailed written instructions for a 3 color basket __________________________________________________________________ you are more than welcome to sell your finished items but please give the turtle trunk credit as pattern designer and link back to my shop www etsy com/shop/theturtletrunk if you have any questions about this pattern please feel free to message me on etsy my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern due to the electronic nature of this pattern we cannot offer refunds or exchanges
